Custom Printing Services

Professional DTF, DTG, and screen printing services with quality results and fast turnaround times.

Professional Printing Solutions

While embroidery is our specialty, we also offer comprehensive printing services to meet all your customization needs. Our printing options provide vibrant colors, detailed graphics, and cost-effective solutions for various project types.

Each printing method has its strengths, and we'll help you choose the best option based on your design, quantity, budget, and timeline requirements.

Printing Process Image

DTF Printing

Direct-to-Film (DTF) printing offers vibrant, full-color designs with unlimited color options. Perfect for detailed graphics and small to medium runs.

Best For:

  • Full-color designs with gradients
  • Detailed graphics and photographs
  • Small to medium quantity orders
  • Cotton and polyester blends
  • Quick turnaround projects

Specifications:

  • Colors: Unlimited
  • Minimum: 6 pieces
  • Materials: Cotton, polyester, blends
  • Durability: 25+ washes

DTF Printing Example

DTG Printing Example

DTG Printing

Direct-to-Garment (DTG) printing creates soft, detailed prints directly on the fabric. Ideal for complex designs and comfortable wear.

Best For:

  • Complex, detailed designs
  • Soft hand feel required
  • Small batch production
  • 100% cotton garments
  • Custom one-off pieces

Specifications:

  • Colors: Full color spectrum
  • Minimum: 6 pieces
  • Materials: 100% cotton preferred
  • Durability: 30+ washes

Screen Printing

Traditional screen printing offers vibrant colors and excellent durability. Most cost-effective for larger quantities and simple designs.

Best For:

  • Large quantity orders (50+ pieces)
  • Simple designs with few colors
  • Team uniforms and events
  • Promotional merchandise
  • Maximum durability needed

Specifications:

  • Colors: 1-6 colors typical
  • Minimum: 25 pieces for best pricing
  • Materials: Most fabric types
  • Durability: 50+ washes

Screen Printing Example

Design Guidelines

To ensure the best results for your printed items, follow these design guidelines:

File Requirements

  • High resolution (300 DPI minimum)
  • Vector files preferred (.ai, .eps, .svg)
  • CMYK color mode for best color matching
  • Outline all fonts before submitting

Design Considerations

  • Consider garment color in design
  • Allow for fabric texture and stretch
  • Avoid very thin lines or small text
  • Use appropriate colors for printing method

Need Help with Your Design?

Our team can help optimize your design for the best printing results.
